Order Confirmation Module

Models

class order_confirmation.models.OrderConfirmation(id, order, email_sent, sent_at, email_content)[source]

Bases: Model

order

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a one-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Restaurant(Model):
    place = OneToOneField(Place, related_name='restaurant')

Restaurant.place is a ForwardOneToOneDescriptor instance.

email_sent

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

sent_at

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

email_content

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

order_confirmation.views.download_receipt(request, order_id)[source]

Generate and return a PDF receipt for an order.

Parameters:

  • request – The HTTP request object.

  • order_id (int) – The ID of the order to generate a receipt for.

Returns:

A PDF file response or an error message if generation fails.

Return type:

HttpResponse
